metadata.title: CVE-2022-44638 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In libpixman in Pixman before 0.42.2, there is an out-of-bounds write (akaheap-based buffer overflow) in rasterize_edges_8 due to an integer overflowin pixman_sample_floor_y.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-44638` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpixman-1-0 - 0.40.0-1ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pixman package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.40.0-1ubuntu0.22.04.1').
